Text: Thanks for the fast and quality work!

Thank you for sharing this, I have been waiting for months to see this and it was worth the wait.

I look forward to episode 2!

Meh... I found it confused and rehashed (there are bits of 'Wonders of the Universe' in it). Disappointing. And let's face it, a natural history documentary without David Attenborough is like a chocolate cake without chocolate!
